field.name: summary
field.value: Child component unable to correctly resolve parent service added after the component

field.name: description
field.value: basically, in a parent-child kernel situation. a component in the child kernel is relying on a service in the parent kernel. if that service is registered after the component. microkernel is unable to resolve the component because the component handler is stuck in WaitingDependency state. It will in fact see the service, but claims that it's still waiting for dependency. attached is a sample that demonstrates the problem.
